app_descript:
Coursera

Brief:

Coursera is an extensive online learning platform that offers you the flexibility to acquire job-relevant skills and earn recognized qualifications from the comfort of your device. It encompasses a wide array of industry-tailored courses, professional certificate programs, and degrees, aiming to cater to various career advancement goals.
